Description.val: Funding provides for the procurement of High Efficiency Small-Capacity (HES-C) Air Conditioning Compressors and Power Management Platform (PMP)(Brushless Generator) for the LHD Midlife Program.  HES-C provides additional air conditioning capability to support growing electronic cooling requirements.  PMP manages the generation and distribution of electric power aboard the ships. Also replaces obsolete main feed pump for main propulsion boiler.

ModificationTitle.val: KK001 - LHD Midlife, Power Management Platform (PMP)(Brushless Generator)

Title.val: KK001 - LHD Midlife, Power Management Platform (PMP)(Brushless Generator)

Name.@footnote: FY 2014 and FY 2015 installation funds are required for DSA for significant Non-Recurring Engineering (NRE) and detail system design for LHD Power Management Platform (PMP) and Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) improvements, which are required to resolve obsolescence issues in advance of the ship availability start in 2Q16.

ImplementationMethodName.val: AIT : Installation Name: Power Management Platform (PMP)(Brushless Generator)

Description.val: This ship alteration improves the reliability, visibility, and control of the LHD 1 Class ships power system.

Name.@footnote: FY 2015 installation funds are required for DSA for significant Non-Recurring Engineering (NRE) and detail system design for LHD Power Management Platform (PMP) and Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) improvements, which are required to resolve obsolescence issues in advance of the ship availability start in 4Q17.

Description.val: This ship alteration improves the HVAC capability for the LHD's as part of the LHD midlife.

ImplementationMethodName.val: [none specified] : Installation Name: Main Feed Pump

Description.val:
FY15 installation funds are required for DSA.

[Main Feed Pump] Replacement of 0bsolete main feed pump with new shock qualified unit to meet service life.

ImplementationMethodName.val: [none specified] : Installation Name: VSD Fire Pumps

Description.val: [VSD Fire Pumps] Replace steam driven fire pumps with variable speed drive (VSD) electric fire pumps to support service life.

ImplementationMethodName.val: [none specified] : Installation Name: Reverse Osmosis Water Generator

Description.val: [Reverse Osmosis Water Generator] Provides additional water making capability to support crew water requirements and additional corrosion washdown in well deck.
